observations: Code review confirms ContentEditor.ascx has fields for: Title, Article Type, Table of Contents, Content, Summary, Tags, Approved checkbox (for moderators)
Code review confirms dnn.wiki.ContentEditor.js has validation for required fields and revision conflict detection
Code review confirms ArticleController.cs handles CRUD operations with revision management through RevisionController
Code review confirms ContentController.cs has Publish() and SaveDraft() API endpoints with proper permission checks
Article detail page URL routing is not configured - all article URLs return 404 Error
Wiki module instances exist on the page (IDs 473, 478, etc.) and display article lists correctly
Primary article dialog (Create article for front page) works but has limited functionality (Content field only)
The 'Create article' functionality appears to work for regular articles but navigating to view/edit them fails
Assets panel from PersonaBar interferes with modal dialogs
PersonaBar iframe intercepts click events, requiring JavaScript evaluation for many interactions
